verses.name: Deuteronomy 1:9
verses.text: And I spake unto you at that time, saying, I am not able to bear you myself alone:

verses.name: Deuteronomy 1:10
verses.text: The Lord your God hath multiplied you, and, behold, ye are this day as the stars of heaven for multitude.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 1:11
verses.text: (The Lord God of your fathers make you a thousand times so many more as ye are, and bless you, as he hath promised you!)

verses.name: Deuteronomy 1:12
verses.text: How can I myself alone bear your cumbrance, and your burden, and your strife?

verses.name: Deuteronomy 1:13
verses.text: Take you wise men, and understanding, and known among your tribes, and I will make them rulers over you.
